result.title: getting started in group
result.content:
Hi so we now have a group which is absoulutely awesome. This would not be possible without MikeMirzayanov so huge thanks to him.

to get started you might want to read this blog: get started with groups

so here is a short intro on the right side you should see a user ratings in a group ratings box. that rating is only for this group ans it does not effect your global rating.

you can also add a blog here if you wish to(just don't spam).

we will have weekly contests in our groups. The contests will be divided into several type.

1) for the first few weeks we will have begineer difficulty problems

2) for some few weeks we will have amateur type problems.

3) and they difficulty of the problems will be increased every few weeks.

also the problems will be targeted at difficulty level.

so I hope you enjoy what is about to follow.
